> [allballsnobrawn](#comment_8_1Kz61HMH26hFwXwRzJoMbHePywcgLCG9fD): The program probably use speech recognition on Petersons extensive collection of YouTube videos and podcasts, so any word he has used are catalogued and split up into individual sound-snippets that will be patched together kinda like a ransom letter ... some transition filtering is probably included, to level out any pitch differences and such...Unless he has used a lot of juicy profanities ( I kinda doubt that he has...) it's not going to be either available, or very good/real sounding...

Peterson seems to be a good test subject because he usually spaces out each word so you can clip words together without making them sound unnatural
